PIZArrayPool Struct Reference

Detailed Description

The pool of dynamic arrays.

Implemented with a linklist.

Warning:
It is currently a very simple approach, and should be improved ; If an array is not released, the pool will grow dramatically for each query.

Field Documentation

pthread_mutex_t PIZArrayPool::lock

POSIX mutex.

long PIZArrayPool::retain

Number of arrays in use.

long PIZArrayPool::initArraySize

Memory size of new array.

PIZGrowingArray* PIZArrayPool::cache

Pointer to the last array delivered.

PIZLinklist* PIZArrayPool::pool

Pointer to the pool's linklist.
